letters.reason: Letter starts with 'Banff, Jan. 4/65' and is addressed to 'Liebe Mutter!'. The content across pages is consistent, discussing cold weather, children (Andri/André, Christopher), and life in Banff. Page CB731DE1-B831-4764-BEBF-25EE428EEEDB provides a logical continuation and closing ('Dein Dorli').

Letter starts with 'Banff, Feb. 16, 65' and is addressed to 'Lieber Walter!'. The pages discuss house renovations and improvements, which flow logically from one page to the next. The last page contains a closing ('Dein Onkel').
